seo.title: Coaching services
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching pathways that support career returners, internationally trained professionals building UK careers, and graduates starting their first roles.

hero.title: Coaching pathways shaped with you
intro: Each pathway is a starting point. We adapt pace, language, and focus once we understand your reality.
Three focused coaching pathways that you can combine or adapt after our 20-minute chat.
chips: Choose the starting point that fits right now.

whoThisIsFor.title: People who find this space helpful
whoThisIsFor.lead: These are the contexts we hear every week. Each link shows scenarios, boundaries, and ways to start.

whoThisIsForCards.title: For mid-career returners
body: Rebuild momentum after a break without pretending the last chapter did not happen.
Clarify what you learned, how it shapes your work now, and how you choose to share it.

whoThisIsForCards.title: For newcomers to the UK
whoThisIsForCards.eyebrow: Coaching for newcomers to the UK
body: Make sense of work, culture, and expectations—without having to translate your whole story from scratch.
Map options, boundaries, and risks so your choices honour visas, values, and energy.

whoThisIsForCards.title: For young professionals
body: Grow into leadership while staying values-led and resourced.
Plan and rehearse feedback, expectation-setting, or boundary conversations with curiosity and respect.

sections.title: You might recognise these moments
sections.lead: Short prompts from real conversations so you can sense whether the rhythm, tone, and care fit what you need.

cards.title: Relocating to the UK
body: You are learning new workplace norms while supporting family in another timezone.

cards.title: Re-entering after care leave
body: You want to return without losing the agreements that protect your household or health.

cards.title: Speaking multiple languages
body: You switch languages mid-sentence to capture nuance and want a coach who can hold that pace.

cards.title: Balancing visas and identity
body: You are weighing sponsorship timelines, belonging, and what leadership looks like in a new system.

cards.title: Catching burnout early
body: You notice signals of exhaustion and want experiments that protect energy before things fracture.

sections.title: Practical, personalised, sustainable
sections.lead: We co-create experiments that are culturally aware, trauma-informed, and kind to your pace.

cards.title: Personalised & flexible
body: We co-design agreements, cadence, and language preferences so the coaching rhythm fits your life and responsibilities.

cards.title: Practical & sustainable
body: Every session ends with right-sized experiments, reflections, or scripts you can use immediately without burning out.

sections.title: A steady process from first chat to ongoing sessions

steps.title: Book your 20-minute chat
body: We talk for 20 minutes to understand what is changing and answer scope questions.

steps.title: Explore together
body: We map priorities, access needs, and the rhythm that keeps you steady.

steps.title: Choose your path
body: Select one of the coaching pathways or co-design something bespoke.

steps.title: Begin your journey
body: We meet online every 2–3 weeks, review progress, and adjust agreements as needed.

sections.title: Not sure where to start?
body: A 20-minute chat lets us hear your context and shape the right mix together.
